code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={isRegistrationModalVisible:false,isLoginModalVisible:false};var modalSlice=createSlice({name:"modal",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setRegistrationModalVisible:function setRegistrationModalVisible(state,action){state.isRegistrationModalVisible=action.payload;},setLoginModalVisible:function setLoginModalVisible(state,action){state.isLoginModalVisible=action.payload;}}});var _modalSlice$actions=modalSlice.actions,setRegistrationModalVisible=_modalSlice$actions.setRegistrationModalVisible,setLoginModalVisible=_modalSlice$actions.setLoginModalVisible;export{setRegistrationModalVisible,setLoginModalVisible};export var RegistrationModalVisibility=function RegistrationModalVisibility(state){return state.modal.isRegistrationModalVisible;};export var LoginModalVisibility=function LoginModalVisibility(state){return state.modal.isLoginModalVisible;};export var modalSliceReducer=modalSlice.reducer;
